com.mopub.common

Interface LifecycleListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseLifecycleListener, MoPubLifecycleManager

    public interface LifecycleListener
    This is a uniform interface to 3rd party SDKs that need to know when Activity lifecycle events occur.

    • Method Summary
